package data

// TestInitialismStruct represents a comprehensive test for -initialism command line option
// Tests various initialism patterns and capitalization handling
type TestInitialismStruct struct {
	// Default initialism words (id, url, api) - should be uppercase
	id       string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetID() + SetID()
	url      string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetURL() + SetURL()
	api      string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetAPI() + SetAPI()

	// Compound words with default initialisms
	userId    string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetUserID() + SetUserID()
	apiKey    string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetAPIKey() + SetAPIKey()
	baseUrl   string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetBaseURL() + SetBaseURL()
	urlPath   string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetURLPath() + SetURLPath()

	// Custom initialism words (will be configured in test)
	xml      string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetXML() + SetXML() (when xml in initialism list)
	json     string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetJSON() + SetJSON() (when json in initialism list)
	http     string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetHTTP() + SetHTTP() (when http in initialism list)

	// Compound words with custom initialisms
	xmlParser   string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetXMLParser() + SetXMLParser()
	jsonData    string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetJSONData() + SetJSONData()
	httpClient  string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetHTTPClient() + SetHTTPClient()

	// Words that should NOT be uppercase (not in initialism list)
	name     string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetName() + SetName()
	data     string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetData() + SetData()
	config   string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetConfig() + SetConfig()

	// Edge cases
	apiApiKey string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetAPIAPIKey() + SetAPIAPIKey()
	urlUrlPath string `property:"get,set"` // Expected: GetURLURLPath() + SetURLURLPath()
}
